name: Headless Prisoner
description:
Erina is a girl who appears in a mysterious place that seems to be an old prison. When she explores the place, she encounters the mysterious character known as the Red Witch, she warns her that place is full of evilness and prisoners who seek for revenge. Erina must find the way to escape from that place without being caught by the prisoners.

This game is about 2-3 hours. The puzzles aren’t too difficult.

The RPT is supposed to be included, but if it doesn’t work maybe you should install it. Also, don’t forget to install the fonts from the Fonts folder

The game has 4 endings; 2 Bad Ends, 1 Good End, and the True End. After the Good End, you’ll unlock an extra part of the game that leads you to the True End.

If you find any mistakes in the translation, please contact me. English isn’t my first language after all.
